channel.title: Need Secondary Developer
channel.description:
Hello there friends,
Today, obviously I'm here because I'm in need of ANOTHER developer. We're currently working on a very large project that's going to be like no other RSPS out there. We're needing somebody with a creative mind, and is just an overall nice person. If I, or our main Developer think that you're impossible to get along with, or just isn't friendly in any way, shape, or form, you will not get the position. The server has been on approximately 3-4 Months. It's been turned offline until the V2 is released because there's really no point in dealing with all of the drama for absolutely nothing, but anyways, back on the point.
What I'm looking for in this Secondary Developer:
[ul][li]You need to be able to add new content, and I don't just mean editing shops, or something like that.[/li] [li]You CANNOT be power hungry like I expect most people will be if they put something on this post.[/li] [li]You need to state your below in the response section below.[/li][/ul]
Thank you, please leave your Skype and Experience below.
EDIT: I literally put no information about the server, hmm... The server is a 718/742 RSPS called Disturbed718. The server is obviously offline right now as I said above, but the forums link is: * We have a great team overall, and just need 1 more to add on.

item.title: Need Secondary Developer
item.dc:creator: @Tyler7835 Tyler7835
item.description:
@Tyler7835 wrote:

Si Force:

You must have your website link approved by a global moderator before you post it in any section other than advertisements. Please feel free to contact any one of us and we’ll take a look at it.

My apologies on that one, I guess I should get a bit more up to date on the rules, hah. Sure, I’ll have it looked at.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Secondary Developer
item.dc:creator: @NukeRune NukeRune
item.description:
@NukeRune wrote:

Hi there,
I’ve recently just shutted down my own server, and I’m just way too lazy to make it online again, had 50 players thought.

Anyways I can develop your server, help out you with problems.

Skype: Pax2605

Read full topic
